titles.title: To clarify the citizenship eligibility for certain members of the Tohono O'odham Nation of Arizona, and for other purposes.
To clarify the citizenship eligibility for certain members of the Tohono O'odham Nation of Arizona, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Allows any member of the Tohono O'odham Nation of Arizona residing on the Nation's lands in Arizona or Mexico to apply for U.S. citizenship during a three-year period.
